events.text:
oh, you really came over here..
I didn't expect that anybody would come over.
there isn't too much here except for some cards.
fridge usually has some nice tasty worms
and after some lunch, I usually just chill infront on this table and play some trance music while playing my cards.

oh.. you do?
Well ok! the rules are simple!!
There will be 3 horizontal bars and a square at the end!!
Hit [color=#FFF200]X[/color] on when it hits the square!!
Simple right?!
Just reach to 250 Points and you'll win!!
LET US BEGIN!
oh ok... you can come back anytime you want.
